short_summary: Request for standing offer for the supply of bulk granular fertilizer products.
description: In soliciting bids for its retail stores, Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada has invited potential buyers to submit tenders to supply bulk granular fertilizer products to the Brandon Research and Development Centre in Brandon, Manitoba.
duration_in_months: It is a one-year contract with the option to extend it by two more years for a total duration of 30 months. 3 the bid is detected to declare   after 2:00pm EST, the need will be considered as not providing/not 99 comply with
full_summary:
**Government of Canada Tender Announcement**
==============================================

### Project Title

01633-230014 - Fertilizer (2)

### Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3576812910
* **Reference Number**: WS3576812910-Doc3770417472
* **Publication Date**: December 8, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 10, 2023, 2:00 pm EST

### Tender Status

The tender is currently **Expired**. The initial publication date was December 8, 2022, and the tender closing date was January 10, 2023, 2:00 pm EST.

### Focal Areas

* **UNSpsc**: Chemical Fertilizers and Plant Nutrients (10171600)
* **UNSPSC Description**: Chemical Fertilizers and Plant Nutrients (English/French)

### Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity**: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Method of Procurement**: Competitive - Open Bidding

### Trade Agreements

The project is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Warnell, Diane (elle-la / she-her)
* **Email Address**: diane.warnell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone Number**: None
* **Fax Number**: None
* **Office Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

### Tender Description

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) has a requirement for the supply of bulk granular fertilizer products to the Brandon Research and Development Centre (
